column1: ('Greatsword', 'is', ['A coarse iron lump of an ultra greatsword.', 'Mows down foes by utilizing its incredible weight.', 'Though handling it likely requires the wielder to have surpassed the realm of the merely human, ', 'it is precisely for this reason the weapon is used to slaughter even inhuman foes.'])

('Zweihander', 'is', ['Just about the largest sword a mere man is capable of swinging. True to its name, it is designed to be wielded in both hands, but those of merely ordinary strength will still struggle to do so.The long blade is heavy and sharp, sending foes reeling back with its broader strokes, while also capable of a devastating piercing thrust.'])
